CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​HTMLTopicPage
public abstract
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​HTMLTopicPage
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​HTMLTopicPages.​Class
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​HTMLTopicPages.​File

A base class for components that build a page of Topics for Output.Builders.HTML.

Usage

  • Create a new HTMLTopicPage.

  • Call Build().

  • Unlike other components, this object cannot be reused for other locations.

Threading: Not Thread Safe

This class is only designed to be used by one thread at a time.  It has an internal state that is used during a call to Build(), and another Build() should not be started until it's completed.  Instead each thread should create its own object.

Functions
HTMLTopicPage
public HTMLTopicPage (
Builders.HTML htmlBuilder
)

Creates a new HTMLTopicPage object.

Build
public bool Build (
CodeDB.Accessor accessor,
CancelDelegate cancelDelegate
)

Builds the page and its supporting JSON files.  Returns whether there was any content.  It will also return false if it was interrupted by the CancelDelegate.

If the CodeDB.Accessor doesn't have a lock, this function will automatically acquire and release a read-only lock.  This is the preferred way of using this function as the lock will only be held during the data querying stage and will be released before writing output to disk.  If it already has a lock it will use it and not release it.

Abstract Functions
GetTopics
public abstract List<Topic> GetTopics (
CodeDB.Accessor accessor,
CancelDelegate cancelDelegate
)

Retrieves the Topics for the page's location.

When implementing this function note that the CodeDB.Accessor may or may not already have a lock.

GetLinks
public abstract List<Link> GetLinks (
CodeDB.Accessor accessor,
CancelDelegate cancelDelegate
)

Retrieves the Links appearing in the page's location.

When implementing this function note that the CodeDB.Accessor may or may not already have a lock.

GetLinkTarget
public abstract HTMLTopicPage GetLinkTarget (
Topic targetTopic
)

Returns a HTMLTopicPage for the target of a link which resolves to the passed Topic.

Abstract Properties
PageTitle
abstract public string PageTitle { get }
IncludeClassInTopicHashPaths
public abstract bool IncludeClassInTopicHashPaths { get }

Whether to include the class in the topic part of hash paths.  For example, you would want "#Class:MyClass:Member" instead of "#Class:MyClass:MyClass.Member".  However, you would want "#File:​MyFile​.cs:MyClass​.Member" instead of "#File:​MyFile​.cs:Member".
